summary: One murdered man, eight women, each seeming to be eager than the others to know the truth. Gimme, gimme, gimme some clues to make up my mind. And eventually enter the truth. Oh, thou cruel woman!
cast: Virginie Ledoyen|Danielle Darrieux|Firmine Richard|Catherine Deneuve|Emmanuelle Béart|Isabelle Huppert|Ludivine Sagnier|Fanny Ardant|Dominique Lamure
title: 8 mujeres
